value:
The meek require a guiding light to
chase away the darkness. Only true
heroes can meet that need.

The Loptr Empire's methods are
merciless. Burning rebels or burying
them alive... Truly an age of darkness.

Just as people seek to use power,
so power seeks to be used in turn.
What matters is how it is used...

As it is said, "A thousand pegasi led
by one dragon can defeat a thousand
dragons led by one pegasus."

The idealist may seek glory by death
in battle, but a ruler must seek only
life, so his people may prosper.

People thrive or decay based on
guidance from their ruler. I wonder...
Which fate will befall those of Askr?$k$pAh, forgive me... I am merely a
traveler.

Do you finally understand? There is
nothing I cannot do.

Our plans shall proceed accordingly,
so long as my advice is respected.

Your concern is appreciated, albeit
wholly unnecessary.

Bounty births greed, and greed
begets conflict. Let us steel our
hearts to avoid that disastrous path.

My name is August, a traveling priest
of Bragi. Allow me to ascertain if my
skills will prove useful...

Allow me a question. In your eyes,
what does the future of this
kingdom—no, this world—hold?$k$pYou may feel you are not able to
presume. That is realistic,
considering your position.$k$pAfter all, it is you and your Heroes
who will play the key role in this
kingdom's survival...or destruction.$k$pYet I wonder: do all these Heroes
understand that the people are the
ones who suffer most in conflict?$k$pWhere will your beliefs and drive
lead? If unending conflict is the
result, so be it...$k$pBut do allow me to bear witness.
はっ
それっ
ぐうっ
I lack the strength...
I'll take care of this.
I know the risks.
It's basic tactics.
Don't be so surprised.
I miscalculated...
Sigh
Get ahold of yourself.
You must not fail.
There is nothing I cannot do. Leave everything to me.
The people don't need a hero. They only need the illusion of one.
My name is August. I am a traveling priest of Bragi.
Hm. Before I do anything, I'll need to inform Lewyn...
Know this: I, August, am here to serve you.
Understood.
Oh. That's it?
A good plan.
